price: "Kuma kunã barin abin da Ubangijinku Ya halitta muku daga mãtanku? Ã'a, ku mutãne ne mãsu ƙẽtarẽwa!"
arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum bal antum qawmun ʿādūna
